articles.title: Revealed: walking just 4,000 steps a day can reduce risk of dying - The Guardian
articles.description: Study also says that each additional 1,000 steps daily are associated with a further 15% reduction in risk
articles.content:
Walking just 4,000 steps a day may reduce your risk of dying from any cause, the largest analysis to date suggests although the more you walk, the greater the health benefits.

articles.title: Boulder storm 'as deadly as Hiroshima' accidentally unleashed by NASA during test to change the... - Daily Mail
articles.description: A new study reveals consequences of NASA's planetary defense test to change the trajectory of an asteroid. The spacecraft released 37 large boulders that are now traveling 13,000mph in space.
articles.content:
A boulder swarm 'as deadly as Hiroshima' was accidentally unleashed by NASA during its first planetary defense mission last year.
